name: AD_FLOOR
description: Below A/D floor (0 DN; was RESERVED_3)

name: NON_SCIENCE
description: Pixel not on science portion of detector

name: OPEN
description: Open pixel (counts move to adjacent pixels)

name: FLUX_ESTIMATED
description: Pixel flux estimated due to missing/bad data

name: MSA_FAILED_OPEN
description: Pixel sees light from failed-open shutter
